data.benefits: Scheme provides monthly rental support to IT/ITeS units of 50% of the rental amount up to Rs 0.10 lakhs per seat per month.
data.eligibility: All existing units engaged in IT/ITeS sector and running its operations within the state are eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The eligible IT/ITeS units opting to start their operations in co-working IT office spaces under the Government facilitated/empanelment model shall be eligible for fiscal support. 
  2. Eligible Unit means any existing unit having a minimum of 15 employees on its payroll. 
  3. Gross fixed capital investment must be less than Rs.25000 lakhs. 
  4. The expenditure incurred under GFCI towards the construction of new buildings shall be capped at Rs.3,000/sq. ft. of built-up area. 
  5. The annual CAPEX assistance disbursed shall be capped to the total annual operating expenditure of the eligible IT/ITeS Units.
data.beneficiaries: All existing units engaged in IT/ITeS sector and running its operations within the state are eligible under the scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The eligible IT/ITeS units opting to start their operations in co-working IT office spaces under the Government facilitated/empanelment model shall be eligible for fiscal support. 
  2. Eligible Unit means any existing unit having a minimum of 15 employees on its payroll. 
  3. Gross fixed capital investment must be less than Rs.25000 lakhs. 
  4. The expenditure incurred under GFCI towards the construction of new buildings shall be capped at Rs.3,000/sq. ft. of built-up area. 
  5. The annual CAPEX assistance disbursed shall be capped to the total annual operating expenditure of the eligible IT/ITeS Units.
data.nodal_agency: Department of Science and Technology, Government of Gujarat.
data.context:
• Gujarat is committed towards promoting faster and inclusive growth in the IT/ITeS Sector. 
  • The IT/ITeS Policy (2022-27) will enable an innovative ecosystem, establish a robust infrastructure and further develop the state's IT talent pool.
data.objective: To establish the state as a hub for innovation in Emerging and Advanced Technologies.
data.description:
Scheme provides monthly rental support to IT/ITeS units to start their operations in co-working IT office spaces: 

  1. For First two years - 50% of the monthly rental, up to Rs 10000 per seat per month. 
  2. For Three to five years - 25% of the monthly rental, up to Rs 5000 per seat per month.
data.how_to_apply: The eligible applicants can apply through Incentive Management Portal : https://dstpolicy.gujarat.gov.in/
data.funding_facilitator: Department of Science and Technology, Government of Gujarat.
data.funding_mechanism: The disbursement of claim will be after final approval by the officer of directorate of ICT & e-Governance.
data.highlights:
The Policy aims to achieve the following milestones in the next five years: 

1) Place Gujarat in the top five performing states of India in IT Sector.

2) Increase Gujarat's annual IT exports from Rs 3000 Crores to Rs 25000 Crores. 

3) Generate more than one lakh new IT/ITeS jobs in the State. 

4) Become the national leader in terms of world-class IT infrastructure, Data Centers and Innovation Centers in Emerging Technologies.
data.additional_info: Fiscal support is for a period of five years from the date of start of commercial operations or in-principle approval, whichever is later.
data.checklist_info_a:
Application Form
Company Registration Documents (Certificate of Incorporation, Partnership Deed, etc.)
GST Registration Certificate
PAN Card of the Company
Project Proposal and Business Plan
Employee Count and Employment Details
Land Documents (Title/Lease Agreement)
EPF and ESI Registration Certificates
Audited Financial Statements
Bank Statements or Financial Institution Documents
Commencement Certificate
In-principle Approval (if applicable)
Statutory Compliance Documents (Factory Act, Minimum Wages Act, etc.)
Other Supporting Documents as per Specific Schemes

data.beneficiary: Specific Industry - Proprietorship, Private Limited Company, Public Company, Partnership, Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) - Gujarat - All MSMEs and Non MSMEs
